metadata.title: CVE-2016-8863 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the create_url_list function ingena/gena_device.c in Portable UPnP SDK (aka libupnp) before 1.6.21 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) or possibly executearbitrary code via a valid URI followed by an invalid one in the CALLBACKheader of an SUBSCRIBE request.

criterions.comment: libupnp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
